title: Farmers Market Store
description: All vegetarian natural food and grocery store with a deli and juice bar. Sits across from the beach/park area. Offers a variety of products including fresh produce, natural body care products, nutritional supplements, refrigerated and frozen food, packaged dried food, tofu, non-dairy milks, baby food, and more. Small store but very well-stocked. Deli features sandwiches, hot foods, soups, salad bar, and juice bar. Everything in the store is either vegetarian with dairy or vegan, but no eggs.
